text:
question: the css file responsible for the responsive grid on HubSpot drag and drop is this one: <https://cdn2.HubSpot.net/hubfs/327485/Designers_Docs_2015/layout.css?t=1496759373214>
 
any way of changing it?
 
to be more precise I wanna change it and get rid of all the floats and make it work using flexbox
you would have to copy and paste all the current items and overwrite them in another stylesheet
I was afraid that this was the only way
You could also just remove it totally and use something like bootstrap 3 / 4 / foundation etc
dow do i remove it compleatly
<@U2PDTMH53|adriancblack> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/adriancblack/F6ACJP7K9/screen_shot_2017-07-15_at_14.40.13.jpg|this is disabled, the grid styles are still included>
